GetClassType.name: GetClassType
GetClassType.description: Returns a type of the ApiDocument class.

params.name: sStyleName
params.description: The style name.

CreateStyle.name: CreateStyle
CreateStyle.description: Creates a new style with the specified type and name. If there is a style with the same name it will be replaced with a new one.

params.name: sStyleName
params.description: The name of the style which will be created.

params.name: sType
params.description: The document element which the style will be applied to.

GetDefaultStyle.name: GetDefaultStyle
GetDefaultStyle.description: Returns the default style parameters for the specified document element.

params.name: sStyleType
params.description: The document element which we want to get the style for.

GetDefaultTextPr.name: GetDefaultTextPr
GetDefaultTextPr.description: Returns a set of default properties for the text run in the current document.

GetDefaultParaPr.name: GetDefaultParaPr
GetDefaultParaPr.description: Returns a set of default paragraph properties in the current document.

CreateSection.name: CreateSection
CreateSection.description: Creates a new document section which ends at the specified paragraph. Allows to set local parameters to the current section - page size, footer, header, columns, etc.

params.name: oParagraph
params.description: The paragraph after which a new document section will be inserted. Paragraph must be in a document.

SetEvenAndOddHdrFtr.name: SetEvenAndOddHdrFtr
SetEvenAndOddHdrFtr.description: Specifies whether sections in this document will have different headers and footers for even and odd pages (one header/footer for odd pages and another header/footer for even pages).

params.name: isEvenAndOdd
params.description: If true the header/footer will be different for odd and even pages, if false they will be the same.

CreateNumbering.name: CreateNumbering
CreateNumbering.description: Creates an abstract multilevel numbering with a specified type.

params.name: sType
params.description: The type of the numbering which will be created.

InsertContent.name: InsertContent
InsertContent.description: Inserts an array of elements into the current position of the document.

params.name: arrContent
params.description: An array of elements to insert.

params.name: isInline
params.description: Inline insert or not (works only for the last and the first element and only if it's a paragraph).

params.name: oPr
params.description: Specifies that text and paragraph document properties are preserved for the inserted elements. The object should look like this: {"KeepTextOnly": true}.

GetCommentsReport.name: GetCommentsReport
GetCommentsReport.description: Returns a report about all the comments added to the document.

GetReviewReport.name: GetReviewReport
GetReviewReport.description: Returns a report about every change which was made to the document in the review mode.

params.name: oProperties
params.description: The properties to find and replace.

params.name: oProperties.searchString
params.description: Search string.

params.name: oProperties.replaceString
params.description: Replacement string.

params.name: oProperties.matchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not.

GetAllContentControls.name: GetAllContentControls
GetAllContentControls.description: Returns a list of all the content controls in the document.

params.name: isTrack
params.description: Specifies if the change tracking mode is set or not.

IsTrackRevisions.name: IsTrackRevisions
IsTrackRevisions.description: Checks if change tracking mode is enabled or not.

GetRange.name: GetRange
GetRange.description: Returns a Range object that represents the part of the document contained in the specified document.

params.name: Start
params.description: Start character in the current element.

params.name: End
params.description: End character in the current element.

GetRangeBySelect.name: GetRangeBySelect
GetRangeBySelect.description: Returns a range object by the current selection.

DeleteBookmark.name: DeleteBookmark
DeleteBookmark.description: Removes a bookmark from the document, if one exists.

params.name: sName
params.description: The bookmark name.

params.name: Comment
params.description: The comment text.

params.name: Autor
params.description: The author's name (not obligatory).

params.name: sName
params.description: The bookmark name.

GetSections.name: GetSections
GetSections.description: Returns a collection of section objects in the document.

GetAllTablesOnPage.name: GetAllTablesOnPage
GetAllTablesOnPage.description: Returns a collection of tables on a given absolute page. This method can be a little bit slow, because it runs the document calculation process to arrange tables on the specified page.

params.name: nPage
params.description: The page number.

GetAllDrawingObjects.name: GetAllDrawingObjects
GetAllDrawingObjects.description: Returns a collection of drawing objects in the document.

GetAllShapes.name: GetAllShapes
GetAllShapes.description: Returns a collection of shape objects in the document.

GetAllImages.name: GetAllImages
GetAllImages.description: Returns a collection of image objects in the document.

GetAllCharts.name: GetAllCharts
GetAllCharts.description: Returns a collection of chart objects in the document.

Search.name: Search
Search.description: Searches for a scope of a document object. The search results are a collection of ApiRange objects.

params.name: sText
params.description: Search string.

params.name: isMatchCase
params.description: Case sensitive or not.

params.name: bHtmlHeadings
params.description: Defines if the HTML headings and IDs will be generated when the Markdown renderer of your target platform does not handle Markdown-style IDs.

params.name: bBase64img
params.description: Defines if the images will be created in the base64 format.

params.name: bDemoteHeadings
params.description: Defines if all heading levels in your document will be demoted to conform with the following standard: single H1 as title, H2 as top-level heading in the text body.

params.name: bRenderHTMLTags
params.description: Defines if HTML tags will be preserved in your Markdown. If you just want to use an occasional HTML tag, you can avoid using the opening angle bracket in the following way: <tag>text</tag>. By default, the opening angle brackets will be replaced with the special characters.

params.name: bHtmlHeadings
params.description: Defines if the HTML headings and IDs will be generated when the Markdown renderer of your target platform does not handle Markdown-style IDs.

params.name: bBase64img
params.description: Defines if the images will be created in the base64 format.

params.name: bDemoteHeadings
params.description: Defines if all heading levels in your document will be demoted to conform with the following standard: single H1 as title, H2 as top-level heading in the text body.

params.name: bRenderHTMLTags
params.description: Defines if HTML tags will be preserved in your Markdown. If you just want to use an occasional HTML tag, you can avoid using the opening angle bracket in the following way: <tag>text</tag>. By default, the opening angle brackets will be replaced with the special characters.

InsertWatermark.name: InsertWatermark
InsertWatermark.description: Inserts a watermark on each document page.

params.name: sText
params.description: Watermark text.

params.name: bIsDiagonal
params.description: Specifies if the watermark is placed diagonally (true) or horizontally (false).

GetAllForms.name: GetAllForms
GetAllForms.description: Returns all existing forms in the document.

SetFormsHighlight.name: SetFormsHighlight
SetFormsHighlight.description: Sets the highlight to the forms in the document.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

params.name: bNone
params.description: Defines that highlight will not be set.

GetAllNumberedParagraphs.name: GetAllNumberedParagraphs
GetAllNumberedParagraphs.description: Returns all numbered paragraphs from the current document.

GetAllHeadingParagraphs.name: GetAllHeadingParagraphs
GetAllHeadingParagraphs.description: Returns all heading paragraphs from the current document.

GetFootnotesFirstParagraphs.name: GetFootnotesFirstParagraphs
GetFootnotesFirstParagraphs.description: Returns the first paragraphs from all footnotes in the current document.

GetEndNotesFirstParagraphs.name: GetEndNotesFirstParagraphs
GetEndNotesFirstParagraphs.description: Returns the first paragraphs from all endnotes in the current document.

GetAllCaptionParagraphs.name: GetAllCaptionParagraphs
GetAllCaptionParagraphs.description: Returns all caption paragraphs of the specified type from the current document.

params.name: sCaption
params.description: Caption type (equation, figure or table).

AcceptAllRevisionChanges.name: AcceptAllRevisionChanges
AcceptAllRevisionChanges.description: Accepts all changes made in review mode.

RejectAllRevisionChanges.name: RejectAllRevisionChanges
RejectAllRevisionChanges.description: Rejects all changes made in review mode.

GetAllBookmarksNames.name: GetAllBookmarksNames
GetAllBookmarksNames.description: Returns an array with names of all bookmarks in the current document.

GetElementsCount.name: GetElementsCount
GetElementsCount.description: Returns a number of elements in the current document.

GetElement.name: GetElement
GetElement.description: Returns an element by its position in the document.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The element position that will be taken from the document.

AddElement.name: AddElement
AddElement.description: Adds a paragraph or a table or a blockLvl content control using its position in the document content.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position where the current element will be added.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The document element which will be added at the current position.

Push.name: Push
Push.description: Pushes a paragraph or a table to actually add it to the document.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The element type which will be pushed to the document.

RemoveAllElements.name: RemoveAllElements
RemoveAllElements.description: Removes all the elements from the current document or from the current document element. When all elements are removed, a new empty paragraph is automatically created. If you want to add content to this paragraph, use the {@link ApiDocumentContent#GetElement} method.

RemoveElement.name: RemoveElement
RemoveElement.description: Removes an element using the position specified.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The element number (position) in the document or inside other element.
